name: Reroll
description:
Bring your D&D characters to life in pixel art. Reroll is a digital character sheet app for D&D 5th Edition that allows you to create and customize your characters in pixel art.

You can customize your character’s body, face, hairstyle, armor, weapons from a plethora of options.
- 14 Supported Races
- 150+ Weapons
- 400+ Armor pieces for you to mix and match
- 20+ Mini bases

Reroll also comes with a nifty mobile character sheet that helps you track your character stats and manage your character’s inventory.
